ISSUE.TITLE: Funnel visualization with many stages overlaps filter widgets

We will acknowledge receipt of your vulnerability and strive to send you regular updates about our progress. If you're curious about the status of your disclosure please feel free to email us again. If you want to encrypt your disclosure email, you can use this PGP key. --> ### Issue Summary See screenshot. When the the funnel visualization has too many stages it overlaps the filter selection widget. Parameter widgets are unaffected because Redash displays them _above_ the visualization. I reproduced on the preview instance [here](https://redash-preview.netlify.app/queries/390?p_num=0#674). ![Screen Shot 2020-06-23 at 16 42 50](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17067911/85467275-9f316300-b570-11ea-8c8c-ebf86337fb34.png) ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Make a funnel chart with twenty stages 2. Add a query filter to any column in your query 3. Observe that the filter widget is overlapped by the visualization This was reported by a customer using Chrome. Also reproduced in Firefox and Safari ### Technical details: * Redash Version: V9 Beta * Browser/OS: Chrome / FF / Safari * How did you install Redash: SaaS
